data.lyric:
[ti:Level of Concern]
[ar:Twenty One Pilots]
[al:Level of Concern]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Level of Concern - Twenty One Pilots
[00:04.70]Lyrics by：Tyler Joseph
[00:09.40]Need you tell me
[00:13.26]Need you tell me
[00:16.11]Panic on the brain world has gone insane
[00:19.83]Things are starting to get heavy mm
[00:24.14]I can't help but think I haven't felt this way
[00:27.73]Since I asked you to go steady
[00:30.73]Wonderin' would you be my little quarantine
[00:35.06]Or is this the way it ends
[00:38.64]'Cause I told you my level of concern
[00:42.61]But you walked by like you never heard
[00:45.92]And you could bring down my level of concern
[00:50.48]Just need you to tell me we're alright
[00:53.23]Tell me we're okay
[00:55.44]Panic on the brain Michael's gone insane
[00:59.12]Julie starts to make me nervous
[01:02.59]I don't really care what they would say
[01:04.97]I'm asking you to stay
[01:07.09]In my bunker underneath the surface
[01:10.28]Wonderin' would you be my little quarantine
[01:14.09]Quarantine
[01:14.56]Or is this the way it ends
[01:18.01]'Cause I told you my level of concern
[01:21.77]But you walked by like you never heard
[01:25.40]And you could bring down my level of concern
[01:29.72]Just need you to tell me we're alright
[01:32.35]Tell me we're okay yeah
[01:34.91]Tell me we're alright tell me we're okay yeah
[01:38.82]Tell me we're alright tell me we're okay
[01:41.80]Bring down my level of concern
[01:45.42]Just need you to tell me we're alright
[01:48.13]Tell me we're okay yeah
[01:57.39]'Cause I told you my level of concern
[02:01.12]But you walked by like you never heard
[02:04.84]You could bring down my level of concern
[02:09.04]Just need you to tell me we're alright
[02:11.80]Tell me we're okay
[02:13.15]I need you to tell me we're alright tell me we're okay
[02:17.08]Need you to tell me we're alright tell me we're okay
[02:20.97]I need you to tell me we're alright tell me we're okay
[02:24.83]Need you to tell me we're alright tell me we're okay
[02:28.81]Need you now
[02:32.83]I need you now
[02:36.73]'Cause I told you my level of concern
[02:40.43]But you walked by like you never heard
[02:43.94]And you could bring down my level of concern
[02:48.38]Just need you to tell me we're alright
[02:51.04]Tell me we're okay yeah
[02:53.55]Tell me we're alright tell me we're okay yeah
[02:57.46]Tell me we're alright tell me we're okay
[03:00.35]You could bring down my level of concern
[03:04.09]Just need you to tell me we're alright
[03:06.78]Tell me we're okay yeah
[03:10.15]In a world where you could just lie to me
[03:14.71]And I'd be okay we'll be okay
[03:18.21]Level of concern
[03:19.57]We're gonna be okay
[03:20.28]Just need you to tell me we're alright
[03:22.64]Tell me we're okay I need you
[03:25.89]Need you tell me
[03:29.93]Need you tell me
data.trans:
[ti:Level of Concern]
[ar:Twenty One Pilots]
[al:Level of Concern]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.70]//
[00:09.40]需要你来告诉我
[00:13.26]需要你来告诉我
[00:16.11]满脑子都是恐慌 世界变得疯狂
[00:19.83]局势开始变得焦灼
[00:24.14]我忍不住胡思乱想 可我未曾察觉
[00:27.73]自从我让你小心谨慎
[00:30.73]陷入沉思 你是否愿意成为我的避风港
[00:35.06]或者说这就是结局
[00:38.64]因为我告诉过你 我十分在意
[00:42.61]可你装作充耳不闻的样子从我身边径直离开
[00:45.92]你可以宽慰我的心 让我别忧思过度
[00:50.48]我只是期盼你告诉我 我们安然无恙
[00:53.23]告诉我 我们一切安好
[00:55.44]满脑子都是恐慌 Michael失去理智
[00:59.12]Julie开始令我感到紧张不安
[01:02.59]我其实不在乎他们会说什么
[01:04.97]我只是恳求你留下
[01:07.09]在我的地下工作室里
[01:10.28]陷入沉思 你是否愿意成为我的避风港
[01:14.09]避风港
